body.name: travel inspira Luggage Scale, Portable Digital Hanging Baggage Scale for Travel, Suitcase Weight Scale with Rubber Paint, 110 Pounds, Battery Included
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 12 hrs 7 mins
features: [Travel without stress] This hanging baggage scale easily prevents overweight baggage charges; a must-have for traveling.

[110-lbs Max Capacity] The travel weight scale has 110lb/50kg weight capacity, allowing you to use it for even those oversized bags. Graduation of portable electronic scale: 0.1lb/50g. Suitcase electronic scale weights 3.5 ounces, small and convenient. No extra space is required to start your adventure.

[Multifunction digital scale] Backlight LCD display is easy to read the digital luggage scale in dim light and bright light. Rubberized handle is comfortable to grip. The data lock function gives you more time to read the results.
[Perfect for travel] Auto-Off feature preserves battery power. Low battery and overload indications. CR2032 battery included.
[Satifaction guaranteed] The ideal gift for travellers, hikers, or anyone who frequently ships packages. Come with a 2-Year Limited warranty from travel inspira.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Save You From Unexpected Overweight Bag Fees Have You Ever -Find it so difficult to weigh your luggage on the body scale? -Feel embarrassed to open your well-packed bags and move items at the airport checking counter? That’s Why You Need The Travel Inspira Luggage Scale

Simple Operation 1. Install the battery 2. Press 'Z/T' button and hang your stuff on the strap,Lift up on the scale and hold until the display flashed 3 times. 3. The value displayed is the weight.Cool Backlight display easy to Read. 4. Light and Compact,easy to carry with you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars travel inspira Luggage Scale - Your Ultimate Travel Companion!
reviews.reviewText: The travel inspira Luggage Scale has become an absolute essential in my travel toolkit, ensuring that I never have to worry about overweight luggage or excess baggage fees again. This portable digital hanging baggage scale is not only reliable but also incredibly user-friendly. Here's why I'm absolutely thrilled with this product:Precision and Accuracy:The accuracy of this luggage scale is impressive. It provides precise measurements down to the decimal point, ensuring that I can pack my bags to the optimal weight and avoid unexpected fees at the airport.Easy-to-Read Display:The digital display is clear and easy to read, even in low-light conditions. It provides a hassle-free experience when weighing my luggage, allowing me to see the weight at a glance.Rubber Paint Finish:The rubber paint finish not only adds a touch of sophistication to the scale but also provides a comfortable and secure grip when handling it. It's a thoughtful design choice that enhances the overall user experience.Portable and Lightweight:This luggage scale is compact and lightweight, making it the perfect travel companion. It easily fits into my carry-on or suitcase, ensuring that I can take it with me on all my trips.110-Pound Capacity:With a generous weight capacity of 110 pounds (50 kilograms), this scale is suitable for a wide range of luggage sizes. Whether I'm packing for a short weekend getaway or a long international trip, it can handle it all.Battery Included:The fact that the battery is included is a small yet appreciated detail. It means that I can use the scale right out of the box without the hassle of purchasing and installing a battery separately.Auto-Off Function:The auto-off function is a great energy-saving feature. It ensures that the scale conserves battery power by turning off automatically after a brief period of inactivity.Tare Function:The tare function allows me to weigh luggage in a container or bag without including the weight of the container itself. It's a handy feature for precise measurements.Peace of Mind:Having the travel inspira Luggage Scale with me when I travel gives me peace of mind. I can confidently check the weight of my luggage before heading to the airport, eliminating the stress of last-minute weigh-ins.In conclusion, the travel inspira Luggage Scale is a must-have for any traveler who values precision, convenience, and savings. Its accuracy, ease of use, and thoughtful design make it a five-star choice for avoiding excess baggage fees and ensuring a stress-free travel experience. Whether you're a frequent flyer or an occasional vacationer, this scale is an invaluable tool that pays for itself with each trip. I wholeheartedly recommend it; it's the ultimate travel companion that guarantees a smoother journey from start to finish!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Must-Have Travel Companion!
reviews.reviewText: The Portable Digital Hanging Baggage Scale has quickly become an indispensable travel tool for me. This compact and lightweight scale have proven to be incredibly accurate and convenient.I love how easy it is to use – just attach it to your luggage, lift, and wait for the clear and precise digital reading. No more surprises at the airport check-in counter! The compact design makes it easy to toss into my travel bag, ensuring I have it on hand whenever I need it.The durability of the scale is impressive, withstood the rigors of travel without any issues. The LCD display is easy to read, even in dim lighting, and the auto-off feature helps conserve battery life.Say goodbye to excess baggage fees and unexpected weight-related travel hassles. This luggage scale is a game-changer for any frequent traveler. I highly recommend it for its accuracy, portability, and overall reliability – a solid 5 stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Could save you a bunch of money at the airport
reviews.reviewText: My grandaughter had this when we cruised last month and it was amazingly accurate. It's so compact and easy to use. I packed within a quarter pound of the limit and was prepared to move stuff between bags if I was overweight.... but this little gadget was spot on. NO need to make any adjustments at the crowded airport. I will never travel without one again.
Very convenient and can take it to wherever you want to go especially airport. It’s very accurate! Thanks.
I like the form factor. It is easy to connect it to a handle or whatever. Great to pack with you to make sure your souvenirs do not exceed your weight allowance. :)
Displays accurate and works well, very compact

Súper fácil de usar, buen tamaño para llevar, ligera y totalmente funcional.Puedes seleccionar entre kg o lb y tiene gran precisión.El gancho y su tela son bastante resistentes para su uso estipulado y ya incluye baterías.
Après plusieurs années en possession je peux faire mon dire que ce produit est très efficace et solide rapport qualité prix top
